edge: Howard Shore composed 'The Departed Tango' as a part of the score for the movie, The Departed.
Howard Shore composed 'Beacon Hill' as a part of the score for the movie, The Departed.
Don Gibson's song 'Sweet Dreams (of You)' was included in the soundtrack of the movie, The Departed.
Ronald Isley's song 'Nobody but Me' was included in the soundtrack of the movie, The Departed.
LaVern Baker's song 'Tweedle Dee' was included in the soundtrack of the movie, The Departed.
Brian Wilson and Van Dyke Parks' song 'Sail On, Sailor' was included in the soundtrack of the movie, The Departed.

Pete Ham's song 'Baby Blue' was included in the soundtrack of the movie, The Departed.
Both musicians, Sharon Isbin and G. E. Smith, contributed to the score of the movie 'The Departed' in 2006.
Both musicians, Sharon Isbin and Larry Saltzman, collaborated with director Martin Scorsese on the score for 'The Departed' in 2006.
All four musicians, Sharon Isbin, G. E. Smith, Larry Saltzman, and Marc Ribot, were involved in composing the score for 'The Departed' directed by Martin Scorsese in 2006.
Director Martin Scorsese collaborated with Sharon Isbin on the score for 'The Departed' in 2006.
Both musicians, G. E. Smith and Larry Saltzman, participated in the creation of the soundtrack for 'The Departed' in 2006.
All three musicians, G. E. Smith, Larry Saltzman, and Marc Ribot, were part of the soundtrack composition for 'The Departed' directed by Martin Scorsese in 2006.
Both musicians, Larry Saltzman and Marc Ribot, were involved in creating the score for 'The Departed' directed by Martin Scorsese in 2006.
Director Martin Scorsese cited 'Murder by Contract' as an inspiration for the guitar-based score of 'The Departed'
Director Martin Scorsese cited the zither in 'The Third Man' as an inspiration for the score of 'The Departed'
